borrowLPT(uint256,int24,int24,uint128).details: The function can be called from Product contracts.

borrowTokens(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: The function can be called from Product contracts.

depositLPT(uint256,int24,int24,uint128).details: The function can be called from Product contracts.

depositTokens(uint256,uint256,uint256,bo.details: The function can be called from Product contracts.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getPrice().notice: Gets current price of underlying token by margin token.

getTWAP().notice: Gets Time Weighted Average Price of underlying token by margin token.

liquidate(uint256,bool,uint256,uint256).notice: Liquidates if margin value is less than min collateral

liquidate3(uint256,bool,uint256,uint256).notice: Liquidates if 75% of collateral value is less than debt value.
